attributes.action: Petition to change 'Winter' to 'The Season of Legendary Landscape Photography'.
attributes.additional_details: This petition is raised to change the name of 'Winter' to 'The Season of Legendary Landscape Photography'. The name 'Winter' has been used for a long time, as is a bit old hat really – changing it is important because landscape photographers need to be reminded to get out and brave the cold in search of stellar pictures. You can find out more at www.advancedphotographer.co.uk
